entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then becoming west 40 gusting to 60. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling.
